dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9621 IH: Justice for Armored Car Crew Members Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gohmert introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that robbery of armored cars constitutes bank robbery, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Justice for Armored Car Crew Members Act of 2022.
Section 2113 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (f), by inserting before the period at the end the following: , and any armored car or armored car company building; and
by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: The term “armored car” means a vehicle used by an armored car company (as such term is defined in section 5(2) of the Armored Car Industry Reciprocity Act of 1993 (15 U.S.C. 5904)) for the purposes described in subparagraph (B) of such section 5(2) (15 U.S.C. 5904(2)(B)).
The term armored car company building means a building used by an armored car company for purposes of engaging in the business of the armored car company.
